item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description:
This is my first blog post with Hugo. Looking forward to moving away from Wordpress.

Let’s see if it can show some source code: “‘Java User user = PropertiesProxy.create(User.class); beanManager.bean(User.class, “users”) // table name is “users” .pk(user.getId(), “user_id”, DBTypes.AUTOINCREMENT) // “id” property maps to “user_id” column .field(user.getName(), “username”, DBTypes.STRING); // “name” property maps to “username” column “’
